task.summary: Remove unused demos, scripts, and assets. Add FancyEditorSoundsSettings with configurable sound and animation options for the editor.
Fixed attack bug where the goblins could attack you from any distance once they got close enough one time.
Commented out debug print statements across multiple scripts and adjusted spacing/formatting inconsistencies. Add double click selection for all units on viewport.

Introduce unit type categorization and refine selection grid logic
Updated `selection_grid.gd` to modularize and simplify unit selection logic. Added `E_UnitType` enum to categorize units. Refactored debug logic; replaced redundant variables and ensured consistency in debug statements across scripts. Removed unnecessary debug flags and cleaned up scenes.

Add `HealthBar` scene and refactor unit script
Introduced `ui/health_bar.tscn` with progress bar styling. Refactored `unit.gd` with adjustments to `z_index` assignment, attack state logic, and indentation fixes. Improved movement handling and streamlined combat logic. Fixed a bug where enemy would attack even when target was outside of attack range.

Add debug label updates and improve script/scene data management
Updated `unit.gd` to manage a second debug label for animation state display. Enhanced debug visuals in `goblin.tscn` with an additional `DebugLabel2` node. Adjusted task history, breakpoints, and watches in workspace configuration for improved debugging. Cleaned unnecessary lines and improved script readability.

Adjust camera bounds, add global max audio distance, and disable debug mode
Updated `camera_bounds` limit values in `main.tscn`. Introduced `max_audio_stream_distance` global constant and applied it to `AudioStreamPlayer2D` instances across scripts. Disabled debug mode in `globals.gd`. Enhanced camera limit updates in `player_camera.gd`.

Refactor UI detail handling and integrate `UiDetail` and `UiDetails`
Renamed and modularized `UI_Detail` to `UiDetail` and `UiDetails` for better clarity and scalability. Updated associated scripts (`hud.gd`, `unit.gd`, etc.) and scenes to reflect the changes. Enhanced property and script export logic for detailed customization. Adjusted resource and path names for consistency in scenes and scripts.

Remove shelved changes, fix z-index assignment, and improve indentation
Deleted outdated shelved `.xml` and `.patch` files. Updated `z_index` usage in `unit.gd` to use `Globals.default_z_index`. Fixed indentation issues and enhanced logic to avoid unnecessary attack logic execution. Improved workspace and script file consistency.

Fixed issue where you would select hovered inanimate objects during select box selection. So you would be selecting units but hovered over a tree and the tree would be selected
Optimize formation manager debugging and refactor worker state handling
Enabled `FormationManager` debug mode and restored debug visuals. Modularized worker state handling in `worker.gd` with dedicated functions for resource, building, and deposit management. Improved debug label updates using `Globals.debug` across scripts. Cleaned redundant and outdated comments. Enhanced script and workspace consistency.

Organize resources and managers, improve path consistency, and add RTS_Resource_Sheep integration
Refactored script paths for improved categorization and clarity (`resources/`, `managers/`). Added `RTS_Resource_Sheep` inheritance chain under `RTS_Resource_Base` and adjusted worker logic to handle new resource types. Integrated `rts_resource_sheep.tscn` into `main.tscn` and updated workspace-related configurations. Ensured workspace and scripts align with updated resource management workflow.

MESSAGE.value: Remove unused demos, scripts, and assets. Add FancyEditorSoundsSettings with configurable sound and animation options for the editor.
Fixed attack bug where the goblins could attack you from any distance once they got close enough one time.
Commented out debug print statements across multiple scripts and adjusted spacing/formatting inconsistencies. Add double click selection for all units on viewport.

Introduce unit type categorization and refine selection grid logic
Updated `selection_grid.gd` to modularize and simplify unit selection logic. Added `E_UnitType` enum to categorize units. Refactored debug logic; replaced redundant variables and ensured consistency in debug statements across scripts. Removed unnecessary debug flags and cleaned up scenes.
Refactor unit script: adjust z-index assignment, fix indentation, add attack state check, and streamline movement logic.

Add `HealthBar` scene and refactor unit script
Introduced `ui/health_bar.tscn` with progress bar styling. Refactored `unit.gd` with adjustments to `z_index` assignment, attack state logic, and indentation fixes. Improved movement handling and streamlined combat logic. Fixed a bug where enemy would attack even when target was outside of attack range.

Add debug label updates and improve script/scene data management
Updated `unit.gd` to manage a second debug label for animation state display. Enhanced debug visuals in `goblin.tscn` with an additional `DebugLabel2` node. Adjusted task history, breakpoints, and watches in workspace configuration for improved debugging. Cleaned unnecessary lines and improved script readability.

Adjust camera bounds, add global max audio distance, and disable debug mode
Updated `camera_bounds` limit values in `main.tscn`. Introduced `max_audio_stream_distance` global constant and applied it to `AudioStreamPlayer2D` instances across scripts. Disabled debug mode in `globals.gd`. Enhanced camera limit updates in `player_camera.gd`.

Refactor UI detail handling and integrate `UiDetail` and `UiDetails`
Renamed and modularized `UI_Detail` to `UiDetail` and `UiDetails` for better clarity and scalability. Updated associated scripts (`hud.gd`, `unit.gd`, etc.) and scenes to reflect the changes. Enhanced property and script export logic for detailed customization. Adjusted resource and path names for consistency in scenes and scripts.

Remove shelved changes, fix z-index assignment, and improve indentation
Deleted outdated shelved `.xml` and `.patch` files. Updated `z_index` usage in `unit.gd` to use `Globals.default_z_index`. Fixed indentation issues and enhanced logic to avoid unnecessary attack logic execution. Improved workspace and script file consistency.

Fixed issue where you would select hovered inanimate objects during select box selection. So you would be selecting units but hovered over a tree and the tree would be selected
Optimize formation manager debugging and refactor worker state handling
Enabled `FormationManager` debug mode and restored debug visuals. Modularized worker state handling in `worker.gd` with dedicated functions for resource, building, and deposit management. Improved debug label updates using `Globals.debug` across scripts. Cleaned redundant and outdated comments. Enhanced script and workspace consistency.

Organize resources and managers, improve path consistency, and add RTS_Resource_Sheep integration
Refactored script paths for improved categorization and clarity (`resources/`, `managers/`). Added `RTS_Resource_Sheep` inheritance chain under `RTS_Resource_Base` and adjusted worker logic to handle new resource types. Integrated `rts_resource_sheep.tscn` into `main.tscn` and updated workspace-related configurations. Ensured workspace and scripts align with updated resource management workflow.

Integrated `rts_resource_sheep.tscn` into `main.tscn` and updated workspace-related configurations. Ensured workspace and scripts align with updated resource management workflow.
